actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives of the United States of America that the people of Wales be permitted to exercise the right of self-determination.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives of the United States of America that the people of Wales be permitted to exercise the right of self-determination.
